LanguageData.Bullet_Mindblast.label: Mind blast wave

LanguageData.Gun_Mindblast.label: Ring of psionic shock
LanguageData.Gun_Mindblast.description: Illithid's simple weapon that amplify psionic power. Can paralyze target or melt target's brain. Only Illithids can use it due to their inborn power.
LanguageData.Gun_Mindblast.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_Mindblast.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: Ring of psionic shock
LanguageData.PsionicShieldBelt.label: Psionic shield generator
LanguageData.PsionicShieldBelt.description: Personal psionic shield generator used by illithids. Only Illithids can use it due to their inborn psionic power.
